short_summary: Provision of educational services and library services for Springhill Institution
description: The Correctional Service of Canada has a requirement to provide educational services and library services for inmates at Springhill Institution. The services will include facilitating inmates' reintegration by increasing educational skill levels through the provision of accredited programs, as well as providing appropriate library services similar to those in the community. The contractor must ensure that the education programs and library services respect gender, ethnic, cultural, and linguistic differences, and are responsive to the special needs of women inmates, Indigenous inmates, inmates requiring mental health care, and other groups.
